Welcome to Blackbeard!

Blackbeard is a project to build a modern, JavaScript-powered Mashery Portal, led by Chris Ferdinandi.

The project is currently in Beta testing, and I could really use your help. You in?

Join the Beta Program →

How to Get Involved

1. Learn About the Features

Blackbeard was built to be extremely customizable and extensible. Our customers can have complete control over the layout, labels, and calls-to-action. Custom JavaScript events let you extend Blackbeard with your own scripts. And built-in tools make it easier and faster to get started.

Dig into the documentation →

2. Create Content

Create pages. Setup APIs. Register for things. Create IO Docs definitions. Try to break things... I tested the site heavily, but I'm certain there are edge cases and things I missed.

Learn how to get started →

3. Report Bugs

If you find something that's broken, can't figure out how it's supposed to work, or just have a question about anything, email me or open an Issue on GitHub.

Report a bug →

4. Request Features

Is there something you've wanted to see in the Portal for a long time? Have a great idea for a new feature? Send me and email and let me know, or open an Issue on GitHub.

Request a feature →
